long_description: In snowboarding, hard spills are unavoidable. But with the Burton Impact wrist guards, fast-riding, high-flying kids will decrease the likelihood of wrist and forearm injuries. Wrist guards help prevent over-torqued wrists without placing potentially harmful pressure on the forearms. Low-profile design fits under most snowboarding gloves and mitts. Flexible, tapered top splints; soft palm pads; rip-and-stick adjustments.
